de.esoco.process.ui

Class UiInputField<T,C extends UiInputField<T,C>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.process.param.ParameterWrapper<T,C>
        • de.esoco.process.ui.UiComponent<T,C>
          • de.esoco.process.ui.UiControl<T,C>
            • de.esoco.process.ui.UiInputField<T,C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UiHasActionEvents<T,C>, UiHasFocusEvents<T,C>, UiHasUpdateEvents<T,C>, org.obrel.core.Relatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UiDateInputField, UiNumberInputField, UiTextInputField

    public abstract class UiInputField<T,C extends UiInputField<T,C>>
extends UiControl<T,C>
implements UiHasUpdateEvents<T,C>, UiHasActionEvents<T,C>
    The base class for input fields.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      C onAction(java.util.function.Consumer<T> rEventHandler)
      Registers an event handler that will be invoked on action events with the new component value.
      C onEnter(java.util.function.Consumer<T> rEventHandler)
      Sets the event handler for input confirmation events (enter key) of this input field.
      C onInput(java.util.function.Consumer<T> rEventHandler)
      Sets the event handler for value update events of this input field.
      C onUpdate(java.util.function.Consumer<T> rEventHandler)
      Registers an event handler that will be invoked on update events with the new component value.
      C placeholder(java.lang.String sPlaceholder)
      Sets a placeholder string to be displayed if the input field is empty.
